story.text: JERUSALEM Jan 2 NDS Group Plc NNDS.O, which provides technology for digital pay-TV, said on Tuesday it had completed its acquisition of Israel's Jungo Ltd., which develops residential gateway software. NDS said a month ago it would acquire Jungo for up to $107.5 million in cash, including a $17 million payment contingent on hitting certain targets in the 12 months after the deal is completed. NDS, a majority owned subsidiary of News Corp. NWS.N, is headquartered in Britain with development centres in Israel and elsewhere. Jungo, whose customers include Cisco (CSCO.O) and Siemens (SIEGn.DE), would continue to operate as a separate unit within NDS under the leadership of the current management team. Jungo's investors include Intel Capital, the venture capital arm of Intel Corp. (INTC.O).
story.title: nds completes $ 107 . 5 mln purchase of israel ' s jungo
